title: Down There (Greek Version)
brief_description: A program about women’s bodies - reproduction, preventative health care and contraception. Using both animation and interviews with women from many different backgrounds, it breaks down the myths, dispels the fears and misinformation by presenting easy-to-understand information about women’s bodies and how they work.
